name: Air Fooz Demo
description:
Air Fooz DemoNot intended as a real game, I just made it for fun.

When I was a kid, I had one of these air football things and just thought it would be cool to recreate it in GameMaker.

Warning: Includes all the silly physics, cheap shots and impossible scenarios! xD

Controls

Player 1
Z + X for flippers

Player 2
C + V for flippers

Right Click to restart.
